replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
seus v11.0 是很久之前的光影了。。未必完全支持 1.14

你可以试试 bsl https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/customization/bsl-shaders

replies.author: tracker—397
replies.txt_content: 在画的后面放置光源,如海晶灯（滑稽）
